content:
In this dataset, people are asked whether they believe a tweet contains hatespeech or not. 0 means no hatespeech, and 1 means that there is hatespeech.

Correct Examples:
Example 1:
Text: I don't know what 'Trish's Dishes' are.
Annotation from annotator: 0

Example 2:
Text: Identity theft in the US is a problem existing almost entirely on account of illegal aliens. Several years ago I found the correlation between ID theft rate and foreign-born population percentage to correlate at a staggering .75 at the state level https://anepigone.blogspot.com/2008/06/more-immigr...
Annotation from annotator: 0

Example 3:
Text: Watching Eng v Bel in a pub off Covent Garden with my son who was just awarded a 1st with honours today in Computer Science. #WorldCup2018
Annotation from annotator: 0

Example 4:
Text: http://thechive.com/2018/09/01/probably-the-cooles...    from theChive.com
Annotation from annotator: 0

Example 5:
Text: Sessions says that Crooked Hillary deserves “due process” http://www.foxnews.com/politics/2018/07/27/session...
Annotation from annotator: 0

Example 6:
Text: check out this article and the link to the meme below. #Dylan https://www.deviantart.com/jiangweisen/journal/Bob...  https://www.deviantart.com/jiangweisen/art/THE-LAD...
Annotation from annotator: 0

Example 7:
Text: Lines from The Right Stuff - Gen Chuck Yeager isn’t liking this either
Annotation from annotator: 0

Example 8:
Text: Gab, where people that think out of the box gather to speak freely...... in group boxes.....
Annotation from annotator: 0

Example 9:
Text: https://blogs.spectator.co.uk/2018/08/the-real-les...  This kind of pathological altruism is what the 'left' appears to be all about at the moment. It's vain, stupid, and is against the rule of law. #immigration #deportation #Islam #news
Annotation from annotator: 1

Example 10:
Text: Wii Sports Kit 7 in 1 https://www.amazon.com/dp/B004UG3N4U?m=A3SG5VL3M26...
Annotation from annotator: 0

Example 11:
Text: A hotfix for Mondrian - Plastic Reality EX4.1 has been released, fixing the 'Invalid Symbols' bug. Now if you try to save a level with invalid OS symbols in the title, you will get an 'Invalid Filename' error. Download the update at itch.io or GameJolt! http://bit.ly/mondrianitch  #indiegames #creatives #arthistory #makeamondrian
Annotation from annotator: 0

Example 12:
Text: Catholics organizing massive November protest in Baltimore. http://thebishopsknew.com/ #DeusVult
Annotation from annotator: 0

Example 13:
Text: I’ve often wondered what it would be like for Globalist groupies once they realized they’re living a lie, but now, I’m seeing that it is we patriotic Americans who have been living in a lie for decades... Our country, branches of gov, our MSM and our schools.. ALL are hijacked.
Annotation from annotator: 0

Example 14:
Text: One of these is a parasite that will feed off of humanity and grow until we are all dead. ...the other one is a gut buster from the fictional movie 'Aliens'. I know it's hard to tell which is which though.  #alexandriaocasiocortez
Annotation from annotator: 0

Example 15:
Text: I find it unbelievable that McSally won over Kelli Ward. what the hell is wrong with AZ. they want another John McCain?
Annotation from annotator: 0

Example 16:
Text: Electoral behavior among Hispanics by whether they racially self-ID as white or non-white Despite being perfect candidate for putative open borders 'natural conservatives', McCain did worse among Hispanics than any other Republican this millennium https://anepigone.blogspot.com/2018/08/electoral-b...
Annotation from annotator: 0

Example 17:
Text: @e @a (forgot the guy doing mobile code :/ ) just downloaded the android app to a tablet.   Kudos on the layout. Darkmode is bada$$ 😎
Annotation from annotator: 0

Example 18:
Text: https://dailycaller.com/2018/08/27/source-fbi-cong...  This is gonna suck. #Comey #Trump #FBI
Annotation from annotator: 0

Example 19:
Text: I'd like to hear some funky Dixieland... https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KHjs6s6gbKc
Annotation from annotator: 0

Example 20:
Text: How about this pos??
Annotation from annotator: 0

Example 21:
Text: Cool enough in SoCal tonight I’m using my car heater in August - dang global warming again 😂
Annotation from annotator: 0

Example 22:
Text: Selfie with a letterbox.   😏😁
Annotation from annotator: 0

Example 23:
Text: #JohnMcCain #SenJohnMcCain #MediaBias #Media #News #Leftists #Liberals #Democrats
Annotation from annotator: 0

Example 24:
Text: Yet another Gabber needing @support , or has this been taken care of?  @Millwood16 - ya' I know, I probably shouldn't tag you with problems, but sometimes it might help people to clarify their support problem.
Annotation from annotator: 0

Example 25:
Text: Valid question:  This was credible enough to actually be covered by NBC news in 2013 - Why has there been silence since then?  Who/what extended the 'quashing' of inquiries beyond the State Dept and into the Media (in this case, NBC news)? https://www.reddit.com/r/greatawakening/comments/9...
Annotation from annotator: 0

Example 26:
Text: There is no such thing as a 'sex worker'. You are a whore. A prostitute.  Preeeeeety much a cum dumpster.
Annotation from annotator: 0

Example 27:
Text: Hope everyone's good... Trying to get back into suitable work and thus my energy is being concentrated into that at present. Also 'Bloodborne' is taking up a fair share of my time too.
Annotation from annotator: 0

Example 28:
Text: Can you find me one instance of someone saying the newest church scandal is a deliberate attempt to undermine the pope's socialist agenda WHILE ALSO decrying the pedarist protectionism?  Hint: you can't, because pedastry is a pillar of the agenda.
Annotation from annotator: 0

Example 29:
Text: ELYRIA — A former Oberlin College instructor and an activist for indigenous people was sentenced to prison for stealing more than $77,000 in federal grants designed to help Native Americans. http://www.chroniclet.com/cops-and-courts/2018/08/...
Annotation from annotator: 0

Example 30:
Text: America would be far better off if Joe Kennedy Sr & Prescott Bush had both been sterile.  And if FDR had been run over by a milk wagon when he was about 3.
Annotation from annotator: 0

Target Example:
Text: #brainwashing of the sheep!!!  https://twitchy.com/samj-3930/2018/08/28/whoopsie-...
Annotation from annotator:
Your output should be a single integer corresponding to the label.
